Package com.jme.scene.plugins.blender.curves

Class CurvesTemporalMesh

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme.scene.Spatial
      • com.jme.scene.Geometry
        • com.jme.scene.plugins.blender.meshes.TemporalMesh
          • com.jme.scene.plugins.blender.curves.CurvesTemporalMesh
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jme.anim.util.HasLocalTransform, com.jme.asset.CloneableSmartAsset, com.jme.collision.Collidable, com.jme.export.Savable, com.jme.util.clone.JmeCloneable, java.lang.Cloneable
    public class CurvesTemporalMesh
extends TemporalMesh
    A temporal mesh for curves and surfaces. It works in similar way as TemporalMesh for meshes. It prepares all necessary lines and faces and allows to apply modifiers just like in regular temporal mesh.
    Author:
    Marcin Roguski (Kaelthas)

    • Constructor Detail

      • CurvesTemporalMesh

        protected CurvesTemporalMesh​(BlenderContext blenderContext)
                      throws BlenderFileException
        The constructor creates an empty temporal mesh.
        Parameters:
        blenderContext - the blender context
        Throws:
        BlenderFileException - this will never be thrown here

      • CurvesTemporalMesh

        public CurvesTemporalMesh​(Structure curveStructure,
                          BlenderContext blenderContext)
                   throws BlenderFileException
        Loads the temporal mesh from the given curve structure. The mesh can be either curve or surface.
        Parameters:
        curveStructure - the structure that contains the curve/surface data
        blenderContext - the blender context
        Throws:
        BlenderFileException - an exception is thrown when problems with reading occur
